title: Revival Under Asa
summary: The prophet Azariah encourages Asa to seek God. Asa responds with greater reforms—removing idols, renewing the covenant, and even removing his own grandmother as queen for idolatry. The people rejoice and experience peace.

faq.question: How did Asa respond to the prophet’s message?
faq.answer: He purged more idols, renewed the covenant, and led national repentance.

faq.question: Why was there peace in Judah?
faq.answer: Because they earnestly sought the Lord and renewed their commitment to Him.
